findings.title: Possible Unintended Uses Of Exchange Unit
findings.description: The FToken decimal plays a critical role to normalize the FToken price and the associated value. If it's not fixed, the exchange unit used for the account health check may be abused for unintended purposes.

findings.title: Generation Of Events For Important States Changes
findings.description: In `Ethereum`, events are crucial for recording runtime dynamics and making logs accessible to external analytics tools. The `BankController` contract lacks emitting important events that reflect state changes, specifically when the `admin` is updated in `claimAdministration()`.
